question.text: The increasing order of volatility of hydrides of group 16 elements is -

solution.text:
Volatility of hydrides VI-A =H2S>H2Se>H2Te>H2O
Volatility∝1molecular weight
But H2O is least volatile due to H- Bond.
So, order of volatility is H2O<H2Te<H2Se<H2S
